scripts.dev:electron: concurrently -k -s first -n vite,electron "vite" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && electron dist/electron/main.js"
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:ts && vite build
scripts.build:ts: npm run build:preload && npm run build:main && vite build
scripts.build:preload: tsc -p tsconfig.preload.json && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const oldPath='./dist/electron/preload.js'; const newPath='./dist/electron/preload.cjs'; if(fs.existsSync(newPath)) fs.unlinkSync(newPath); fs.renameSync(oldPath,newPath);"
scripts.build:electron: npm run clean && npm run build:ts && vite build && electron-builder
